alert.note: Alert for Washtenaw (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 20 at 3:30PM EDT until July 20 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: The National Weather Service in Detroit/Pontiac has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Washtenaw County in southeastern Michigan... * Until 500 PM EDT. * At 330 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Brighton to 6 miles southwest of Stockbridge to near Jackson, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Whitmore Lake around 340 PM EDT. Chelsea around 350 PM EDT. Dexter around 405 PM EDT. Ann Arbor and Dixboro around 425 PM EDT. Saline and Salem around 430 PM EDT. Ypsilanti around 440 PM EDT. Willis around 450 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Hudson Mills, Pittsfield Township, Whittaker, Lyndon Township, Hudson Mills Metropark, Bridgewater, Delhi Mills, Pleasant Lake and Barton Hills. People attending Ann Arbor Art Fair should seek safe shelter immediately! HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
